DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/realtime/k.description: Deletes a participant for the given meeting and participant ID.

parameters.description: ID of the meeting. You can fetch the meeting ID using the create a meeting API.
parameters.name: meeting_id

parameters.description: ID of the participant. You can fetch the participant ID using the add a participant API.
parameters.name: participant_id

created_at.description: Timestamp this object was created at. The time is returned in ISO format.

custom_participant_id.description: A unique participant ID generated by the client.

preset_id.description: ID of the preset applied to this participant.

updated_at.description: Timestamp this object was updated at. The time is returned in ISO format.

code.description: HTTP status code of the error.

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtime/kit/.description: Returns all meetings for the given App ID.

parameters.description: The page number from which you want your page search results to be displayed.
parameters.name: page_no

parameters.description: Number of results per page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The start time range for which you want to retrieve the meetings. The time must be specified in ISO format.
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: The end time range for which you want to retrieve the meetings. The time must be specified in ISO format.
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: The search query string. You can search using the meeting ID or title.
parameters.name: search

created_at.description: Timestamp the object was created at. The time is returned in ISO format.

live_stream_on_start.description: Specifies if the meeting should start getting livestreamed on start.

persist_chat.description: Specifies if Chat within a meeting should persist for a week.

record_on_start.description: Specifies if the meeting should start getting recorded as soon as someone joins the meeting.

session_keep_alive_time_in_secs.description: Time in seconds, for which a session remains active, after the last participant has left the meeting.

status.description: Whether the meeting is `ACTIVE` or `INACTIVE`. Users will not be able to join an `INACTIVE` meeting.

summarize_on_end.description: Automatically generate summary of meetings using transcripts. Requires Transcriptions to be enabled, and can be retrieved via Webhooks or summary API.

updated_at.description: Timestamp the object was updated at. The time is returned in ISO format.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtime/kit/.summary: Fetch all meetings for an App

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtime/kit/.description: Returns a meeting details in an App for the given meeting ID.

parameters.description: ID of the meeting. Fetch the meeting ID using the create a meeting API.
parameters.name: meeting_id

created_at.description: Timestamp the object was created at. The time is returned in ISO format.

live_stream_on_start.description: Specifies if the meeting should start getting livestreamed on start.

persist_chat.description: Specifies if Chat within a meeting should persist for a week.

record_on_start.description: Specifies if the meeting should start getting recorded as soon as someone joins the meeting.

session_keep_alive_time_in_secs.description: Time in seconds, for which a session remains active, after the last participant has left the meeting.

status.description: Whether the meeting is `ACTIVE` or `INACTIVE`. Users will not be able to join an `INACTIVE` meeting.

summarize_on_end.description: Automatically generate summary of meetings using transcripts. Requires Transcriptions to be enabled, and can be retrieved via Webhooks or summary API.

updated_at.description: Timestamp the object was updated at. The time is returned in ISO format.

recording_config.description: Recording Configurations to be used for this meeting. This level of configs takes higher preference over App level configs on the RealtimeKit developer portal.

audio_config.description: Object containing configuration regarding the audio that is being recorded.

channel.description: Audio signal pathway within an audio file that carries a specific sound source.

codec.description: Codec using which the recording will be encoded. If VP8/VP9 is selected for videoConfig, changing audioConfig is not allowed. In this case, the codec in the audioConfig is automatically set to vorbis.

export_file.description: Controls whether to export audio file seperately

audio_config.title: AudioConfig

file_name_prefix.description: Adds a prefix to the beginning of the file name of the recording.

max_seconds.description: Specifies the maximum duration for recording in seconds, ranging from a minimum of 60 seconds to a maximum of 24 hours.

enabled.description: Controls whether recordings are uploaded to RealtimeKit's bucket. If set to false, `download_url`, `audio_download_url`, `download_url_expiry` won't be generated for a recording.

access_key.description:
Access key of the storage medium. Access key is not required for the `gcs` storage media type.

Note that this field is not readable by clients, only writeable.

auth_method.description: Authentication method used for "sftp" type storage medium

bucket.description: Name of the storage medium's bucket.

host.description: SSH destination server host for SFTP type storage medium

password.description: SSH destination server password for SFTP type storage medium when auth_method is "PASSWORD". If auth_method is "KEY", this specifies the password for the ssh private key.

path.description: Path relative to the bucket root at which the recording will be placed.

port.description: SSH destination server port for SFTP type storage medium

private_key.description: Private key used to login to destination SSH server for SFTP type storage medium, when auth_method used is "KEY"

secret.description: Secret key of the storage medium. Similar to `access_key`, it is only writeable by clients, not readable.

username.description: SSH destination server username for SFTP type storage medium

codec.description: Codec using which the recording will be encoded.

export_file.description: Controls whether to export video file seperately

height.description: Height of the recording video in pixels

watermark.description: Watermark to be added to the recording

height.description: Height of the watermark in px

width.description: Width of the watermark in px
Width of the recording video in pixels

recording_config.title: RecordingConfig

ai_config.description: The AI Config allows you to customize the behavior of meeting transcriptions and summaries

summary_type.description: Defines the style of the summary, such as general, team meeting, or sales call.

text_format.description: Determines the text format of the summary, such as plain text or markdown.

word_limit.description: Sets the maximum number of words in the meeting summary.

keywords.description: Adds specific terms to improve accurate detection during transcription.

language.description: Specifies the language code for transcription to ensure accurate results.

profanity_filter.description: Control the inclusion of offensive language in transcriptions.

ai_config.title: AIConfig

code.description: HTTP status code of the error.

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong.

picture.description: URL to a picture of the participant.

port.description: SSH destination server port for SFTP type storage medium

private_key.description: Private key used to login to destination SSH server for SFTP type storage medium, when auth_method used is "KEY"

secret.description: Secret key of the storage medium. Similar to `access_key`, it is only writeable by clients, not readable.

username.description: SSH destination server username for SFTP type storage medium

codec.description: Codec using which the recording will be encoded.

export_file.description: Controls whether to export video file seperately

height.description: Height of the recording video in pixels

watermark.description: Watermark to be added to the recording

height.description: Height of the watermark in px

width.description: Width of the watermark in px
Width of the recording video in pixels

recording_config.title: RecordingConfig

ai_config.description: The AI Config allows you to customize the behavior of meeting transcriptions and summaries

summary_type.description: Defines the style of the summary, such as general, team meeting, or sales call.

text_format.description: Determines the text format of the summary, such as plain text or markdown.

word_limit.description: Sets the maximum number of words in the meeting summary.

keywords.description: Adds specific terms to improve accurate detection during transcription.

language.description: Specifies the language code for transcription to ensure accurate results.

profanity_filter.description: Control the inclusion of offensive language in transcriptions.

ai_config.title: AIConfig
